name: Travel By Nail
description:
My first submition for a jam other than a "My first game" jam. I am very exited, though due to planning errors i didnt get as much time as i wanted, therefore the game is somewhat unfinished, but still more than playable. Costructive criticism is welcome and encouraged.

Thank you!

!!!!! EXTRA TUTORIAL !!!!!

I didnt get the time to add this into the game, here are some bonus controls. 

F: Toggle fullscreen

R: Restart level
